description: A Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to create and control ghosts called Hollows. These ghosts can pass through solid objects and drain the willpower and motivation of anyone they touch, causing severe depression.

abilities.description: Creates ghost-like hollows that pass through people and cause them to become extremely depressed and pessimistic.

strengths: Ghosts can phase through physical defenses
Psychological attack that bypasses physical durability
weaknesses: Standard Devil Fruit weaknesses (sea water, Seastone)

reveals.information: Can create Negative Hollows that drain willpower and cause depression
